channel.title: Posts on Blog of mine
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blog of mine

item.title: Intelligent Decision Analysis of Converter Station SER Based on FP-Growth Algorithm
item.description: (IEEE Sustainable Power and Energy Conference, iSPEC2021) Abstract In order to improve the efficiency of operation and maintenance personnel in the research and judgment of the massive SER data generated by the converter station protection and enhance the converter station protection capability, a method based on FP-Growth algorithm for intelligent Decision Analysis of Converter Station SER. A multi-dimensional model is established for SER when converter station fails using data cleaning and association rule mining methods, and FP-Growth algorithm is used for data mining and analysis to obtain SER fault credible group.

item.title: 基于改进关联规则算法的换流站SER日志异常分析方法
item.description: （电力系统自动化 已录用） 摘要 随着我国特高压交直流电网的大规模运行，直流换流站一、二次设备复杂程度不断增高，使得直流系统发生状态转换或故障时，
